products.title: Splash Mid Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Mid Grey Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £7.96 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Mid Grey roller blinds are a beautiful contemporary cool grey colour. A timeless grey colour that will compliment most color palettes within the home or office. Our roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your space. Also, our made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee providing additional peace of mind when investing in this product.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2045 Fabric Colour: Mid Grey Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Tropez Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Tropez Grey Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £8.83 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Tropez has an elegant grey/brown hue, with its rich earthy tones it will compliment a vast range of interior colour palettes. Our Roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which provides extra peace of mind that you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Pebble Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Pebble Grey Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £9.35 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Pebble Grey is a beautiful saturated red shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Our Splash Pebble Grey roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms.
Our Roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

products.title: Splash Dark Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Dark Grey Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £9.35 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash range of fabrics are both beautiful contemporary. The Dark Grey roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Our roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring acorn pull which removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. The Splash Dark Grey roller fabric is also moisture resistant which means it is the best choice for bathrooms and kitchens. This blind is made to measure as such will be covered with our FREE 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in our blinds.
